actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Mount Rainier National Park, Wash., as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in the Mount Rainier National Park in Washington as wilderness, to be administered by the Secretary of the Interior. Authorizes the Secretary to utilize aircraft and scientific devices for volcanic and glacial research in the wilderness areas.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Mount Rainier National Park, Wash., as wilderness.
